data.title: Botswana - Time Zone Info
data.meta_description: Current date and time for Botswana time zone. Current daylight saving time (DTS), time zone offset, time differences, and more.
data.text:
All of Botswana uses the same time zone, namely Africa/Gaborone. The UTC time zone offset is --, also called --. Botswana does not observe daylight saving time.

Botswana (Off. Republic of Botswana) has a population of 2.3 million people with Gaborone as the capital city . The official currency is Pula ( BWP ). Botswana is locaded in Southern Africa , has an area of 600,000 kmÂ² and is bordering Namibia, South Africa and Zimbabwe .

The next holiday in Botswana is Botswana Day on September 30, 2024
